name: A Day in the Woods
description: A Day in the Woods is a stylish re-imagining of the traditional sliding puzzle game. Solve 60 hexagon-tiled levels, with increasingly complex difficulty in as few moves as possible while avoiding the beasts lurking in the woods!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card with 128 MB, Shader model 2.0. ATI X800, NVidia 6600 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Beautiful puzzle game with some fun stuff to unlock like seasonal backgrounds and sprite customizations. Completing a level may not seem too difficult until you try for those 3 star ratings. A nice challenge and fun to play. I got this one on sale but it's definitely worth the regular price of $4.99.
